projects.name: DevChallenge Profile App
projects.description: A full-stack application made with React, .NET Core, and MongoDB. The app allows the user to sign up, log in, create and update their profile, and upload a profile picture. The app is deployed on Netlify, and the backend is deployed on Azure. This app use the Image Uploader Master API, to upload the profile picture.

projects.name: Canada Provinces App
projects.description: A simple app made with HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript that consumes a JSON file. This app displays information about the provinces of Canada. It also allows the user to search for information of a specific province, city or college.

projects.name: Tasky
projects.description: A robust web application project showcasing my proficiency in React and Vite, focused on a To-Do application. The project incorporates essential features such as login and signup forms, authentication interceptors, and custom hooks.

projects.name: Image Uploader Master
projects.description: This project showcases my skills in developing a full-stack application using React, .NET Framework, and Firebase Storage. With this app, users can easily upload and manage their images to a cloud storage service.

projects.name: Movie Booking App
projects.description: This project is designed to facilitate the booking of movie tickets by providing users with an intuitive web interface. A form made with HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript that allows the user to select a movie, the number of tickets, and the showtime. The form also calculates the total price of the tickets and stores the data in the local storage.

projects.name: Smart Vehicle App
projects.description: An Angular app that consumes a REST API made with Loopback 4 and a MongoDB database. The app allows the user to create, read, update, and delete vehicles. The app is deployed on Firebase, and the backend is deployed on Azure.

testimonials.name: Wilder Mancera
testimonials.comment: Leonardo is a very responsible and dedicated person. He is a great team player and is always willing to help others. Leonardo is a skilled developer who continuously seeks ways to improve his skills.

testimonials.name: Wilmer Triana
testimonials.comment: Leonardo is an excellent professional. He is technically committed and has a great attitude towards work. Leonardo is a team player and excels in problem-solving.

testimonials.name: Marco Bedon
testimonials.company: Robotics and Programming Instructor at Colegio Jefferson
testimonials.comment: Leonardo is a brilliant, imaginative, and highly creative developer who actively shares his knowledge with others. His talent and passion for technology are evident in his work.

testimonials.name: Alexandra Vargas
testimonials.comment: I worked with Leonardo on an Angular project for 4 months, and he proved to be an excellent developer. Leonardo possesses extensive knowledge and excellent communication skills, making him a valuable asset to any team.

skills.description: With technologies such as React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Sass, I can develop responsive and user-friendly web applications.
When it comes to backend development, I rely on technologies such as .NET, C#, Java, and Spring Boot to build robust and scalable applications.
Databases are essential for storing and retrieving data. I have experience working with MongoDB, MySQL, and SQL Server.
Nowadays, cloud computing is a must. I have experience working with Azure, Firebase, and Netlify.
Tools such as Git, Docker, Postman, and Vite are essential for developing and deploying applications.
